ComicInfo.Summary:
Even legends die – but does the world now belong to the wolves as Alec Worley’s werewolf-apocalypse story ‘Age of the Wolf’ returns for a third series in 2000 AD Prog 1840! There’s murder most foul in ‘Judge Dredd: Wastelands’, Finnigan thinks it’s time to pay the piper in ‘Sinister Dexter: In Plain Shite’, the gods quite literally walk the Earth in ‘The Ten-Seconders: Godsend’, and if you can’t beat them, join them in ‘Defoe: The Damned’!
